title: Frumefni
exit: With a burst of winds, a shove from a stone, or some other propulsion, you launch yourself through the air. Leave your stance and spend all your energized. Leap up to 10 feet per energized spent, or Stride your Speed with a status bonus to your speed equal to 5 times the energized spent. You may Swim, Climb, Fly, or Burrow instead of Striding if you have the appropriate speed
description: The Frumefni are a sect of primal magic users who harness the nearly-wild magic that powers all spellblades to wield the traditional elements.
